item.description: How to reverse proxy to a custom dynamic download URL that is stored in Redis with Nginx and Lua

item.description: Implement a File Download Service that can handle large file downloads and multiple file downloads as zip

item.title: Updates to AutoConfiguration in Spring Boot 3
item.description: If you are working with a custom starter library, take note of this auto-configuration change!

item.title: Database Integration Testing for Custom Spring Boot Data Access Starter Library using Testcontainers
item.description: How to set up a Spring Boot project with database integration testing using Testcontainers for MongoDB

item.title: What I Love About Data Access Layer (DAL) When Building Small Backend Projects
item.description: Benefits of using a common data access library to access the database for small projects with multiple microservices

item.title: How to Query the Active Directory Using Spring Boot LdapTemplate
item.description: Quick Overview on LDAP queries with Spring Boot LdapTemplate

item.description: Sharing what I found useful in understanding Spring Cloud Config with Spring Boot

item.title: 5 Observations on Spring Boot's Loading Precedence for Properties Files With Spring Cloud Config
item.description: Sharing my experience on the order of precedence for properties files in Spring Boot applications when using Spring Cloud Config and Spring Profiles
